summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2003 for the improvement of East Seventieth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks and crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 20408, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
